item.title: Syntax Highlighting With Prismjs
item.description: I use Prismjs for code syntax highlighting on this site. I write pages in Markdown and I use Hugo to generate the site. Prism allows you to choose only the languages and features you want when you download it, so you can minimize its footprint. Basic Markdown code fences with a language annotation do basic highlighting.
